name: Simarjeet Singh
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology (GGSIPU)

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology (GGSIPU)

projects.name: Real-Time Chat App
projects.description: Developed a full-stack Web application to display Chat messages. Messages appear in real-time, ensuring instant communication. Quick access to start private conversations. Push notifications for new messages and chat updates. Users can create or join group chats with multiple participants.

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Implemented a responsive frontend using React.js, ensuring seamless navigation and an intuitive interface. Created a robust backend using Express.js and Node.js to handle user authentication, video streaming, and database operations. Implemented user authentication and authorization features, enabling secure access to the platform. A CRUD application exposed using a RESTful API made with Node.js and React.js.

projects.name: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Integrated Syncfusion UI components for user authentication, interactive charts, dynamic forms, and data tables within the dashboard. Employed advanced optimization techniques like lazy loading and streamlined data retrieval, significantly enhancing dashboard load times and overall performance. Delivered an impactful dashboard with enriched data visualization, resulting in improved user engagement and satisfaction.

experiences.description: Collaborated with the development team to design and implement engaging and interactive games aimed at teaching coding concepts to young learners. Participated in code reviews to ensure the quality and efficiency of the software, with a focus on optimization and best coding practices. Created detailed documentation for codebases, making it easier for team members to understand and maintain the projects.
